title: Right side of the phone screen is unresponsive
content:
I tried a reset.
I turned the phone off for a couple of hours.
I took the SIM out and tried a reset.
I turned the phone off for a couple of hours without the SIM in.
I checked for updates, there were none.
I made sure the problem was not because of any apps.
I have now attempted a factory reset, but the right side of the screen is still not responding and so I cannot even press "Start".
